br.octahedron.cotopaxi.datastore.jdo
Class DatastoreFacade

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.datastore.jdo.DatastoreFacade

public class DatastoreFacade
extends Object

Facade to JDO DataStore. Provides methods to save, load and query objects in low level.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Nested Class Summary

          This class is a wrapper to the PersistenceManagerFactory.

Parameters:

startsWithQuery

public <T> List<T> startsWithQuery(Class<T> klass,
                                   String prefix,
                                   String attribute)
Query for all entities of the given class with the given attribute starts with the given prefix;

Parameters:
prefix - the attribute's prefix to be queried
attribute - the entity attribute being queried
Returns:
a list of all entities which attribute starts with the given prefix. If no entity be found, it returns an empty list.
